instruction: Create a basic newsletter signup section for Shopify 2.0 with email input, submit button, and privacy compliance

requirements: Display a heading, short description, and email input field
Include a submit button with loading state
Support GDPR-compliant privacy notice with link to privacy policy
Use Shopify's native customer registration form handling
Responsive layout: single column on mobile, centered content
constraints: Must not use JavaScript for form submission (use native form)
Max 3 settings in schema (heading, description, enable_privacy)
accessibility: Email input has proper label and aria-describedby
design_requirements: Consistent spacing using theme spacing scale
shopify_standards: Uses {{ 'key' | t }} for all user-facing text

instruction: Build a hero banner section with image background, headline, subheading, and call-to-action button

requirements: Full-width background image with focal point support
Overlay text (headline, subheading, CTA button) centered vertically and horizontally
CTA links to a collection or custom URL
Mobile-responsive: stack text on small screens
constraints: Use only one image setting in schema
No external libraries or custom JS
All text must be translatable via translation keys
edge_cases: Dark vs light background text contrast
accessibility: Image has alt text from settings
Text has sufficient contrast against background
design_requirements: Use theme color variables for text/button
shopify_standards: Uses block for CTA (allow multiple buttons if needed)
Supports image focal point via image_picker

instruction: Implement a product recommendation section that shows 'You may also like' based on current product tags

edge_cases: All matching products are out of stock
accessibility: Image alt text includes product title
Price announced clearly by screen readers
design_requirements: Grid uses CSS grid with gap from theme
Image aspect ratio maintained (square or portrait)
shopify_standards: Uses product card snippet if available
Follows Dawn theme product grid patterns
Schema includes enabled_on for product pages
Translatable strings for all UI text

'+' : '-'; }); }); // Price range sliders minPriceInput.addEventListener('input', updatePriceRange); maxPriceInput.addEventListener('input', updatePriceRange); function updatePriceRange() { minPriceValue.textContent = formatMoney(minPriceInput.value); maxPriceValue.textContent = formatMoney(maxPriceInput.value); } // Format money according to shop currency function formatMoney(amount) { return parseFloat(amount).toLocaleString(window.Shopify.locale, { style: 'currency', currency: window.Shopify.currency.active }); } // Apply filters applyFiltersBtn.addEventListener('click', applyFilters); // Clear all filters clearFiltersBtn.addEventListener('click', clearAllFilters); // Handle filter selection changes filterOptions.forEach(option => { option.addEventListener('change', function() { updateActiveFiltersDisplay(); }); }); function applyFilters() { const params = []; // Get price parameters if (minPriceInput.value > 0 || maxPriceInput.value < maxPriceInput.max) { params.push(`constraint=price:${minPriceInput.value}-${maxPriceInput.value}`); } // Get other filter parameters filterOptions.forEach(option => { if (option.checked) { params.push(`${option.name}=${option.value}`); } }); const queryString = params.join('&'); // Update URL const newUrl = `${window.location.pathname}?${queryString}`; window.history.pushState({ path: newUrl }, '', newUrl); // Fetch filtered products fetchFilteredProducts(queryString); } function fetchFilteredProducts(queryString) { const productGridContainer = document.getElementById('product-grid-container'); productGridContainer.innerHTML = '
    Loading...

    Error loading products. Please try again.

priceFilterItem.textContent = `Price: ${formatMoney(minPriceInput.value)} - ${formatMoney(maxPriceInput.value)}`; priceFilterItem.appendChild(createRemoveButton('price')); activeFiltersList.appendChild(priceFilterItem); filterItem.appendChild(createRemoveButton(option.name, option.value)); activeFiltersList.appendChild(filterItem); } }); } function createRemoveButton(name, value = null) { const removeBtn = document.createElement('button'); } else { const option = document.querySelector(`input[name="${name}"][value="${value}"]`); if (option) option.checked = false; } updateActiveFiltersDisplay(); applyFilters(); }; return removeBtn; } // Initialize active filters display updateActiveFiltersDisplay(); instruction: Create an icon set snippet using inline SVGs for common interface elements (search, cart, user, menu).

requirements: Provide a reusable snippet for rendering SVG icons
Accept 'icon' parameter to determine which icon to render
Output clean, semantic inline SVG code
Include common icons: menu, search, cart, account, close
constraints: No inline styles (use attributes only if needed for sizing)
edge_cases: Icon used as decorative (aria-hidden) vs functional
accessibility: Default to aria-hidden='true' unless specified otherwise
Proper title tags for screen readers if needed
shopify_standards: Use Liquid case statement for switching icons

output:
{%- liquid
  assign icon_name = icon | default: 'menu'
  assign width = width | default: 24
  assign height = height | default: 24
  assign aria_hidden = aria_hidden | default: true
  assign title = title | default: ''
  assign classes = classes | default: 'icon icon-' | append: icon_name
-%}

{%- case icon_name -%}
  {%- when 'menu' -%}
    <svg
      class="{{ classes }}"
      width="{{ width }}"
      height="{{ height }}"
      viewBox="0 0 24 24"
      fill="none"
      xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
      aria-hidden="{{ aria_hidden }}"
      {% if title != '' %} role="img" aria-label="{{ title }}"{% endif %}
    >
      <path d="M3 12H21" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"/>
      <path d="M3 6H21" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"/>
      <path d="M3 18H21" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"/>
    </svg>
  {%- when 'search' -%}
    <svg
      class="{{ classes }}"
      width="{{ width }}"
      height="{{ height }}"
      viewBox="0 0 24 24"
      fill="none"
      xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
      aria-hidden="{{ aria_hidden }}"
      {% if title != '' %} role="img" aria-label="{{ title }}"{% endif %}
    >
      <circle cx="11" cy="11" r="8" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"/>
      <path d="M21 21L16.65 16.65" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"/>
    </svg>
  {%- when 'cart' -%}
    <svg
      class="{{ classes }}"
      width="{{ width }}"
      height="{{ height }}"
      viewBox="0 0 24 24"
      fill="none"
      xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
      aria-hidden="{{ aria_hidden }}"
      {% if title != '' %} role="img" aria-label="{{ title }}"{% endif %}
    >
      <path d="M9 20C9 21.1 8.1 22 7 22C5.9 22 5 21.1 5 20C5 18.9 5.9 18 7 18C8.1 18 9 18.9 9 20ZM20 20C20 21.1 19.1 22 18 22C16.9 22 16 21.1 16 20C16 18.9 16.9 18 18 18C19.1 18 20 18.9 20 20ZM1 1H4L6.68 14.39C6.77144 14.8504 7.02191 15.264 7.38755 15.5583C7.75318 15.8526 8.2107 16.009 8.68 16H19.4C19.8693 16.009 20.3268 15.8526 20.6925 15.5583C21.0581 15.264 21.3086 14.8504 21.4 14.39L23.5 5H6" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"/>
    </svg>
  {%- when 'account' -%}
    <svg
      class="{{ classes }}"
      width="{{ width }}"
      height="{{ height }}"
      viewBox="0 0 24 24"
      fill="none"
      xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
      aria-hidden="{{ aria_hidden }}"
      {% if title != '' %} role="img" aria-label="{{ title }}"{% endif %}
    >

      <circle cx="12" cy="7" r="4" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"/>
    </svg>
  {%- when 'close' -%}
    <svg
      class="{{ classes }}"
      width="{{ width }}"
      height="{{ height }}"
      viewBox="0 0 24 24"
      fill="none"
      xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg"
      aria-hidden="{{ aria_hidden }}"
      {% if title != '' %} role="img" aria-label="{{ title }}"{% endif %}
    >
      <path d="M18 6L6 18" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"/>
      <path d="M6 6L18 18" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round"/>
    </svg>
  {%- else -%}

      class="icon icon-placeholder"
      width="{{ width }}"
      height="{{ height }}"
      viewBox="0 0 24 24"
      fill="none"

      aria-hidden="{{ aria_hidden }}"
    >
      <rect x="3" y="3" width="18" height="18" rx="2" stroke="currentColor" stroke-width="2"/>
    </svg>
{%- endcase -%}

instruction: Create a pagination snippet for browsing collections and blog pages.

requirements: Display page numbers (with ellipsis for large page counts)
Link to current page with active state (non-clickable)
constraints: Handle edge case where only 1 page exists (hide pagination)
Maximum 5 page numbers visible in UI
accessibility: Clear link text for screen readers
shopify_standards: Accept 'paginate' object as parameter if used in snippet

output:
{%- liquid assign pagination_anchor = '#ProductGridContainer' if template == 'collection' or template == 'search' assign pagination_anchor = '#main-collection-product-grid' elsif template == 'blog' assign pagination_anchor = '#BlogPosts' endif -%} {%- if paginate.parts.size > 0 -%}
    {%- if paginate.previous -%}
  • ←
    • {%- endif -%} {%- for part in paginate.parts -%} {%- if part.is_link -%}
  • {{- part.title -}}
    • {%- else -%} {%- if part.title == paginate.current_page -%}
  • {{- part.title -}}
    • {%- else -%}
  • {{ part.title }}
    • {%- endif -%} {%- endif -%} {%- endfor -%} {%- if paginate.next -%}
  • →
    • {%- endif -%}
{%- endif -%} {%- comment -%} Note: This snippet assumes the parent template includes the {% paginate %} tag passing the paginate object to this snippet via include or render. Example usage: {% render 'pagination', paginate: paginate %} {%- endcomment -%}

instruction: Create a breadcrumbs snippet to display the site navigation hierarchy (Home > Collection > Product).

requirements: Generate links for Home, Collection (if applicable), and Product/Page
Use the default template type detection
constraints: Avoid using JS to generate links
Handle root page (no breadcrumbs on home)
Limit depth to 3 levels to save space
edge_cases: Product belongs to multiple collections (pick first or use none)

output:
{%- liquid unless template == 'index' or template == 'cart' or template == '404' assign items_count = 0 if template.name == 'product' assign items_count = 3 elsif template.name == 'collection' and collection.handle assign items_count = 2 elsif template.name == 'page' assign items_count = 2 elsif template.name == 'blog' assign items_count = 2 elsif template.name == 'article' assign items_count = 3 endif if items_count > 0 -%}
  1. {{ 'general.breadcrumbs.home' | t }}
    2. {%- if template.name == 'product' -%} {%- if collection.url -%}
  2. {{ collection.title }}
    3. {%- endif -%}
  3. {{ product.title | truncate: 50 }}
    4. {%- elsif template.name == 'collection' and collection.handle -%}
  4. {{ collection.title }}
    5. {%- elsif template.name == 'page' -%}
  5. {{ page.title }}
    6. {%- elsif template.name == 'blog' -%}
  6. {{ blog.title }}
    7. {%- elsif template.name == 'article' -%}
  7. {{ blog.title }}
  8. {{ article.title | truncate: 50 }}
    9. {%- endif -%}
{%- endif -%} {%- endunless -%}

Size Chest Waist Hips Length

L 38-40" 32-34" 40-42" 29"
XL 40-42" 34-36" 42-44" 30"

Fit Guide

How to Measure

1
Chest

Measure around the fullest part of your chest, keeping the measuring tape horizontal.

2
Waist

Measure around the narrowest part of your waist, keeping the measuring tape horizontal.

3
Hips

Measure around the fullest part of your hips, keeping the measuring tape horizontal.

Tips for Best Results
  • Measure over undergarments for most accurate results
  • Keep measuring tape snug but not tight
  • Ask someone to help for hard-to-reach measurements
  • Take measurements twice to ensure accuracy

Unit Converter

Common Conversions
1 inch = 2.54 cm
1 foot = 30.48 cm
1 meter = 39.37 inches
1 cm = 0.39 inches
